11.eng-name: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Malik bin Al-Huwairith said:"I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), when he started to pray, raise his hands, and when he bowed, and when he raised his head from bowing, until they were parallel with the top of his ears

chapter.eng-name: Raising the hands parallel to the ears
